problems.title: First Repeating Element
problems.description:
Problem Statement
Given an array of N integers, find the first repeating element. An element is repeating if it appears more than once in the array. The "first" repeating element is the one whose first occurrence has the smallest index.

If there are no repeating elements, print -1.

Input Format
- First line: An integer N (number of elements).
- Second line: N space-separated integers.

Output Format
- Print the value of the first repeating element. If none, print -1.

Example 1
Input:
7
10 5 3 4 3 5 6

Output:
5

Explanation:
- 5 repeats (first seen at index 1)
- 3 repeats (first seen at index 2)
Since index 1 is smaller than index 2, the answer is 5.
hintsList: Use a hash map to store the frequency of each element.
Traverse the array again and check the frequency of each element in the map.
The first element with a frequency greater than 1 is the answer.
